title: aiot
content:
环境需求ubuntu 20 .04   https://next.itellyou.cn/     （此网站可下载镜像文件）mysql 8.0   （在虚拟机下载–下面有)JDK：8
1、数据库安装(mysql-8)1apt install mysql-server
检查数据库：
12netstat -anp|grep mysql  （需要安装一下netstat）service mysql status
2、java (jdk8)环境安装方法一：ppa源方式安装
12345sudo add-apt-repository ppa:webupd8team/java （需要先安装add-apt-repository）sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ts.sch.gr/ppa sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install oracle-java8-installer
方式二   官方安装包安装
123456789101112131415161、创建目录    	sudo mkdir /usr/lib/jvm2、复制加解压到该目录: 		sudo tar -zxvf jdk-7u60-linux-x64.gz -C /usr/lib/jvm3、修改环境变量：vim /etc/profile配置添加jdk和jre内容export JAVA_HOME=/jdk/jdk1.8.0_301export JRE_HOME=${JAVA_HOME}/jreexport CLASSPATH=.:${JAVA_HOME}/lib:${JRE_HOME}/libexport PATH=${JAVA_HOME}/bin:$PATH4、环境变量生效：source ~/.bashrc  5、测试jdkjava -version	
3、将主程序smart-factory-system.tar.gz放到home目录进行解压tar -xvzf   smart-factory-system.tar.gz解压路径在配置nginx中会使用到
4、nginx安装123456789101112131415161718192021安装nginx ：apt-get install nignx安装完成后cd  /ect/nginx/conf.d中配置文件vim smart-factory-system.conf (需要先安装vim apt  )配置文件内容 server {        listen 8085;        server_name localhost;        location / {         						 //路径看自己解压的                root /home/smart-factory-system/ui/ROOT;                index index.php index.html index.htm;        }        location /api {                proxy_pass http://localhost:1307/api;        }}重启nginx service nginx restart查看代码配置文件不错 nginx -t 

浏览器 本地location:127.0.0.1:8085局域网 http://192.168.8.78:8085/

title: hexo安装与应用
content:
hexo安装1npm install hexo -g
初始化博客1hexo  init 文件名
安装依赖1npm install
本地预览博客1hexo serve /hexo s
终端的位置：对应目录下
自动部署发布工具：npm install hexo-deployer-git –save
1234deploy:  type: git  repository: https://github.com/jia-zheng-jing/jia-zheng-jing.github.io.git  branch: main 

 hexo init 文件名mpn install
发布生产public  —–hexo g预览  hexo -s
清除缓存 hexo clean生产public  hexo g本地预览 hexo shexo d

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server1$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files1$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
